UniprotID	O96006
Accession	O96006;Q96BY4
EntryName	ZBED1_HUMAN
ProteinName	E3 SUMO-protein ligase ZBED1 (EC 2.3.2.-) (DNA replication-related element-binding factor) (Putative Ac-like transposable element) (Zinc finger BED domain-containing protein 1) (dREF homolog)
GeneName	ZBED1 ALTE DREF hDREF KIAA0785 TRAMP
Length	694
Function	Functions as an E3-type small ubiquitin-like modifier (SUMO) ligase which sumoylates CHD3/Mi2-alpha, causing its release from DNA (PubMed:27068747). This results in suppression of CHD3/Mi2-alpha transcription repression, increased recruitment of RNA polymerase II to gene promoters and positive regulation of transcription including H1-5 and ribosomal proteins such as: RPS6, RPL10A, and RPL12 (PubMed:12663651, PubMed:17209048, PubMed:17220279, PubMed:27068747). The resulting increased transcriptional activity drives cell proliferation (PubMed:12663651, PubMed:17220279). Binds to 5'-TGTCGGAA-3' consensus sequences in gene promoters of ribosomal proteins (PubMed:12663651, PubMed:17209048, PubMed:17220279, PubMed:27068747).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; PML body; Nucleus; Nucleus; PML body
Disorder	0.5992,0.6427,0.5098,0.5211,0.4369,0.3840,0.3740,0.4017,0.4476,0.4685,0.4541,0.4831,0.4685,0.4541,0.4051,0.3215,0.3872,0.2951,0.2064,0.2129,0.1251,0.1323,0.1251,0.1914,0.1702,0.2436,0.2988,0.2164,0.1476,0.0870,0.0888,0.0592,0.0592,0.0592,0.0372,0.0306,0.0275,0.0287,0.0306,0.0287,0.0240,0.0372,0.0364,0.0231,0.0188,0.0136,0.0125,0.0125,0.0231,0.0364,0.0555,0.0568,0.0631,0.0631,0.0372,0.0618,0.0676,0.1373,0.1298,0.2002,0.3087,0.3631,0.4051,0.4119,0.3872,0.3149,0.4186,0.3215,0.2680,0.2503,0.2436,0.2609,0.2541,0.3392,0.3494,0.4017,0.4017,0.4901,0.4441,0.3460,0.3087,0.3053,0.2541,0.1476,0.1349,0.2164,0.2364,0.2164,0.3426,0.4119,0.4119,0.4119,0.4087,0.4119,0.4256,0.4149,0.4582,0.4619,0.4220,0.3740,0.4507,0.4186,0.4087,0.4087,0.5139,0.5211,0.5254,0.5098,0.5296,0.4901,0.4725,0.4685,0.4831,0.4831,0.4940,0.3840,0.3872,0.3494,0.3117,0.2817,0.2817,0.3053,0.2884,0.2164,0.1449,0.1583,0.1554,0.1028,0.1028,0.1137,0.0985,0.0985,0.0646,0.0424,0.0433,0.0443,0.0851,0.0870,0.0568,0.0662,0.0662,0.0690,0.0443,0.0690,0.1137,0.1759,0.1731,0.1969,0.2715,0.2752,0.2645,0.2193,0.2503,0.3182,0.3740,0.3566,0.2503,0.1554,0.1476,0.2436,0.2399,0.2715,0.2609,0.3566,0.3807,0.3704,0.3117,0.2988,0.2436,0.1881,0.2715,0.2752,0.2884,0.1852,0.1251,0.1229,0.1399,0.1449,0.1823,0.2034,0.1702,0.1791,0.1298,0.1184,0.1007,0.0531,0.0543,0.0967,0.1028,0.0985,0.0851,0.0851,0.0749,0.1206,0.1914,0.2752,0.2918,0.2752,0.3182,0.2575,0.1791,0.2129,0.1373,0.1852,0.2436,0.2436,0.2193,0.1501,0.1424,0.0817,0.1007,0.1323,0.1501,0.1643,0.0835,0.0454,0.0414,0.0300,0.0294,0.0349,0.0631,0.0506,0.0281,0.0463,0.0592,0.0349,0.0389,0.0506,0.1007,0.1115,0.1881,0.2002,0.2399,0.1823,0.1881,0.2884,0.2849,0.2951,0.3392,0.2752,0.2002,0.1229,0.2164,0.2399,0.1449,0.0851,0.1759,0.0929,0.1349,0.0676,0.0592,0.0424,0.0398,0.0253,0.0163,0.0148,0.0120,0.0198,0.0198,0.0205,0.0171,0.0263,0.0483,0.0473,0.0398,0.0506,0.0870,0.0646,0.0646,0.0646,0.0646,0.0380,0.0506,0.0327,0.0405,0.0555,0.0568,0.0531,0.0618,0.0313,0.0178,0.0313,0.0313,0.0327,0.0
